summary: The diff only shows metadata updates to project_state.json tracking the deployment requirement (REQ-18), but contains no actual deployment implementation, configuration changes, or evidence that the application was deployed to Internet Computer mainnet.

missing_requirements.requirement: Deploy the application to the Internet Computer mainnet so it is publicly accessible with a permanent canister URL
missing_requirements.reason: No deployment configuration files modified (dfx.json, canister_ids.json), no deployment scripts added, no evidence of mainnet deployment commands executed, and no canister URLs or deployment artifacts present in the diff
